<<<<<<< HEAD
Lucida intervalla, containing divers miscellaneous poems, written at Finsbury and Bethlem by the Doctors patient extraordinary. Carkesse, James, fl. 1679.
[2], 68 p.
[s.n.], London : 1679.
Poems concerning the author's treatment in Bedlam and directed chiefly against Dr. Thomas Allen. Attributed to James Carkesse. Cf. Halkett & Laing, BM. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
